steps.title: Founded in Shenzhen, with an ASEAN mission
steps.body: SHD was founded in Shenzhen in 2013 and set its sights on Southeast Asia with one clear purpose: helping brands truly win locally. We combine cross-border expertise with strong on-the-ground teams—guiding brands from 0→1 with clarity, then building the foundation for sustainable scale.

steps.title: Built the infrastructure to scale—properly
steps.body: Growth needs systems that can carry it. We invested in local warehousing, in-country logistics, and after-sales service—then connected online and offline through a full OMO operating model. With 1,000+ KA channel partners and a mature digital marketing engine, we help brands scale faster with quality intact.

steps.title: A 4D growth engine: from 0–1 to 1–100
steps.body: We run on a four-dimensional operating framework—Brand Positioning → Channel → Marketing → Operations—turning strategy into measurable growth. SHD has enabled 20+ consumer electronics brands to succeed across ASEAN, with several reaching #1 in their categories on major platforms within their first year.

bo.name: Bo
bo.headline: Becoming the best version of myself
bo.quote: Working here as an E-commerce Manager means becoming the best version of myself. It’s not just about executing tasks—there’s space to think outside the box, experiment, and learn through real action (learning by doing). What truly sets this place apart is the fun—work never feels boring because there are new challenges and new innovations to explore every day. If you want an environment that pushes you to grow while having fun, this is genuinely the right place.

apple.name: Apple
apple.headline: A field with no ceiling for ideas
apple.quote: As a Business Development Director, what excites me most is being in a field where ideas have no ceiling. We move at high-growth speed, which gives us the freedom to craft strategy and open new waters. We don’t just wait for opportunities—we create them through data analysis and real execution. The focus here is turning ideas into business outcomes with massive impact. If you love challenge in a fast-decision, result-oriented environment, you’ll love working here.

rodtu.name: Rodtu
rodtu.headline: Unlocking potential beyond what people expect
rodtu.quote: The most challenging and exciting part of being HR here is working in a fast-paced environment that changes constantly. My role is to discover and push people’s potential beyond what they think is possible. We don’t look for people who only follow instructions—we look for those with drive and the willingness to grow at the speed of the business. Seeing teammates make bold decisions and improve through real work every day proves that our culture truly brings out the best in everyone.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Choose a category and click to expand

fulltime.q: I want to add more details to my resume. Should I resubmit my application?
fulltime.a:
You can email the recruiter who contacted you and request an update to your profile.

Alternatively, you may submit a new application with your updated resume if you applied recently.

fulltime.q: Can I apply for more than one role at the same time?
fulltime.a:
Yes, you can apply to multiple roles. Our recruiters will help identify the best fit for you.

Please note: you can only be in one interview process at a time.

fulltime.q: Can I reapply for the same role if I didn’t hear back previously?
fulltime.a:
Yes. If the role is still open, you may reapply.

However, we recommend improving your skills/experience before applying again.

fulltime.q: How can I check my application status?
fulltime.a: Our recruiting team will update you via email regarding your status and next steps. Please allow some time for us to get back to you.

fulltime.q: What do recruiters look for during a phone interview?
fulltime.a:
Recruiters want to understand your skills, experience, and motivation to join the company. They also look for enthusiasm and culture fit.

Be yourself—and show genuine interest in the company.

internship.q: I’m interested in an internship, but I graduated a few months ago. Can I apply?
internship.a: We encourage recent graduates to explore full-time roles, where you can take on more meaningful work and learn faster.

internship.q: When is the internship period, and when should I apply?
internship.a: We hire interns year-round. There’s no fixed internship season—check job listings for current internship opportunities.

internship.q: How long is the internship? Can I choose my own duration?
internship.a:
We recommend a minimum of 3 months so you can contribute to meaningful projects.

Extensions may be possible depending on business needs and manager approval.

tech.q: Do I need a CS/CE degree to apply for tech roles?
tech.a:
No. We welcome applicants from all backgrounds for tech roles.

However, a CS/CE degree can be an advantage.

tech.q: What should I expect from a technical interview?
tech.a: You may be assessed on coding skills, logical reasoning, and CS fundamentals. Please prepare accordingly.
